hero.name: Mohamad Ramadan
hero.description: Full Stack Web Developer specialized in building production-ready systems from scratch, including authentication, multi-role dashboards, and real business logic.
hero.cvAlert: The CV is not available for download at the moment. It will be uploaded soon.

meta.title: Mohamad Ramadan | Full Stack Web Developer

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Full Stack Web Developer who builds practical systems end-to-end. I enjoy taking concepts from idea to production and solving real problems with clean, maintainable code.
about.additionalDescription: I focus on system-level development, working with authentication flows, admin dashboards, database design, and real business requirements. I have hands-on experience converting Figma designs into functional applications.

projects.title: Selected Projects
projects.description: A range of practical systems and web applications, with live demos and source code.
projects.privateDescription: These projects were developed for specific clients and are not publicly available due to confidentiality and ownership rights.
projects.learningDescription: Early projects used to strengthen core frontend skills and explore UI concepts.

p1.title: Electronic Blog
p1.description: A responsive blog application built with modern frontend practices, focusing on clean UI, performance, and maintainable code.

p2.title: Wood Calculator System
p2.description: Calculates wood cubic measurements based on accounting experience.
p2.tech: Tech: JavaScript. Convertible to Web App.

p3.title: Coffee Shop Website
p3.description: Built with HTML, CSS and JavaScript with several animations.

p5.title: Wood Management System
p5.description: Full JS system to manage wood inventory — a practical project.

p9.title: ISEF Prototype 1
p9.description: A prototype for ISEF participants containing scientific material.
p9.disclaimer: Preview or code are not available as this is a private project.

p10.title: ISEF Prototype 2
p10.description: A second prototype for ISEF participants with a different design approach.
p10.disclaimer: Preview or code are not available as this is a private project.

future.title: Future Development Path
future.point1: Deep dive into Cyber Security principles and practices.
future.point2: Advanced understanding of Networking & Internet Systems architecture.

p1.title: Korsaty (Udemy Competitor)
p1.description: A complete educational platform featuring multi-role access (Admin, Instructor, Student), course management, and content delivery systems, built with a focus on scalability.

p2.title: Sab3awy Clothing System
p2.description: An end-to-end management system for a clothing business, handling inventory, sales, and reporting. Currently undergoing a strategic migration to a modern React & Laravel stack for enhanced performance and features.

p3.title: Wasel Food Delivery
p3.description: End-to-end food delivery platform with multi-role access (Super Admin, Restaurant Admin, Customers), secure authentication, order lifecycle management, and commission system.
